alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Dickinson; Iron; Marquette; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 05 at 1:12PM EDT until April 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT /4 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING TO 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility near zero miles in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Baraga, Marquette, Iron, Dickinson and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 5 PM EDT /4 PM CDT/ this afternoon. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening to 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Dickinson; Iron; Marquette; Southern Houghton
